column1: Smoque BBQ////Good 'ol Southern Cookin! Very popular place and for good reason. Great bbq sauce and very tender meat. Menu is short and sweet
column2: but you can't go wrong! Ribs are my favorite! The cornbread
column4: and peach cobbler are the best sides. Cole slaw is vinegar based and the beans are...well
column6: but the food does add up money-wise!
